doc.field: /9200385/BibliographicResource_3000117343795
en
Rhyl record and advertiser - 1902-02-22
Began with: issue for: 9 Oct. 1886. Ended with issue for: 24 Nov. 1917.
Description based on issue for: 9 Oct. 1886.
Cyhoeddwyd yn Y Rhyl gan Amos Brothers (1886-1902); Rhyl Record and Advertiser Co. Ltd. (1911-1917).
Published in Rhyl by Amos Brothers (1886-1902); Rhyl Record and Advertiser Co. Ltd. (1911-1917).
Continued from 1902-1911 as: Record and advertiser, and reverted in 1911 to: Rhyl record and advertiser.
From 1917 continues as: Rhyl advertiser.

Papur newydd wythnosol a hyrwyddai gwleidyddiaeth ryddfrydol. Cyhoeddwyd yn Saesneg yn bennaf. Cofnodai newyddion am Y Rhyl, Llanelwy, Prestatyn, Abergele, Bae Colwyn, Rhuddlan a'r cyffiniau. Yn ystod misoedd yr haf, cofnodai restr gyflawn o ymwelwyr. Cylchredwyd yn ardal y Rhyl a siroedd y Fflint a Dinbych. Teitlau cysylltiol: Record and advertiser (1902-1911); Rhyl advertiser (1917- ).

A weekly English language newspaper, supportive of liberal politics, which circulated around Flintshire and Denbighshire. The newspaper's main content included local and district news of St. Asaph, Prestatyn, Abergele, Colwyn Bay and Rhuddlan, but during the summer months also incorporated a list of visitors. Associated titles: Record and advertiser (1902-1911); Rhyl advertiser (1917- ).
